query:
SELECT 
  p.id as pesquisa_id,
  p.nome as pesquisa_nome,
  p.status,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as total_clientes,
  COUNT(DISTINCT m.id) as total_mercados,
  COUNT(DISTINCT prod.id) as total_produtos,
  COUNT(DISTINCT conc.id) as total_concorrentes,
  COUNT(DISTINCT l.id) as total_leads
FROM pesquisas p
LEFT JOIN clientes c ON c.pesquisaId = p.id
LEFT JOIN mercados_unicos m ON m.pesquisaId = p.id
LEFT JOIN produtos prod ON prod.pesquisaId = p.id
LEFT JOIN concorrentes conc ON conc.pesquisaId = p.id
LEFT JOIN leads l ON l.pesquisaId = p.id
WHERE p.projectId = 1
GROUP BY p.id, p.nome, p.status
ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC;
